name: Maze Cartoon Labyrinth 3D HD
description:
Maze Cartoon labyrinth is 3D a arcade, casual game. You exist in a maze as a Cartoon figure. Your aim is to find a way ( path ) from randomly generated labirints (mazes). You have to roll ( tilt ) zig zag, from right to left to avoid cube blocky wall obstacles. After you finish your goal, you get into a new level. Level geometry is completely 3D. You need a level of craft to smoothly escape each level, that means without smashing into the walls. You have a joystick to control slide rolling motion of cartoon figure.

- Fun, free, adventure game
- Eye touching glow HD graphics
- Puzzle brain challenging gameplay for kids
- Joyful game that makes you jump or hit something
- 13 different toon hand-drawn figures to pick
